text: Soni mwasoomelani abali ja Nuhu, ndema jajwatite kwa ŵandu ŵakwe: “E ŵandu ŵangu! Nakuŵaga kukunsakalisya kutama kwangu (nomwe) ni kumbusya kwangu ma Ȃya ga Allah, basi kwa Allah njegamiile, basi songanganyani malindi genu pamo ni akwawanganya ŵenu (ni Allah), soni malindi genugo gakaŵa gakusisika kukwenu, kaneko ni mpitisye chilamusi chenu kukwangu soni nkamba lipesa.”
